ExploreFact.Text: This planet is covered in molten rock (ouch)
I found a Nomai log talking about.. waiting and.. clockwork? It cut off before I could figure out what they were on about.
Apparently this 'lava transfer' is powering something on Spirus 4 <color=orange>(I doubt the S was of significance)</color>, maybe that'll get me home?
Solanum was here! And it seems like they found their way back to my system (There's hope after all!). Shame they left this place how they found it...
